last_episode_to_air.name: Babies Go Home
last_episode_to_air.overview: The third part of "The Baby Bot Chase".

name: Rolie Polie Olie
overview:
Rolie Polie Olie was a children's television series produced by Nelvana, distributed by Disney, and created by William Joyce, Maggie Swanson, and Anne Wood. The show centers on a little roly pollie who is composed of several spheres and other three-dimensional geometric shapes. The show was one of the earliest series that was fully animated in CGI, and the first CGI animated preschool series.Rolie Polie Olie now airs in reruns on Disney Junior.

Rolie Polie Olie won a Gemini Award in Canada for "Best Animated Program" in 1999. The show also won a Daytime Emmy Award for "Outstanding Special Class Animated Program" in 2000 and 2005. William Joyce won a 1999 Daytime Emmy for Best Production Design for this series. The show has a vintage atmosphere reminiscent of the 1950s and early 1960s, with futuristic elements.

episodes.name: Little Sister, Big Brother / Through Trick and Thin / Bedlam
episodes.overview: Olie's getting ready for school.  Zowie, as usual, is just happy to be with her big brother.  But she's starting to get on his nerves.; Olie wishes he and Spot could be like his TV heroes Space Boy and Space Dog.  Unfortunately, Spot doesn't seem as heroic as Space Dog.; It's time for the kids to go to bed, but they just don't seem to want to.  Mom and dad are going to have a hard getting these two in bed.

episodes.name: Ciminin Toast / I Find Rock / Tooth on the Loose
episodes.overview: Olie and Zowie decide to make breakfast for their  parents. However, what will they make and will it taste good.; Zowie fids a rock and wants to keep it as a pet. Even  though her parents know that rocks are better when they're outside.; Papi's teeth come flying out of his mouth again. It's up to Olie to help Papi get them back.

episodes.name: Nap for Spot / The Monster Movie Night / The Top Dog Fish
episodes.overview: Spot's sleepy and he must find his way.; Olie's friend Billy stays at the Polies for the late-night TV Monster Movie Marathon; When the Polies look after a fish from Olie's school, Spot becomes jealous.

episodes.name: The House Detectives / The Backyard Jungle / The Best Doggone Show in the World
episodes.overview: Olie and Zowie must find Percy's keys; Olie grows a giant tomato plant; Telly (Tubey) the Television gets under the weather and the Polies can't watch their favorite show.

episodes.name: Mutiny on the Bouncy / Roll the Camera / Pappy's Boat
episodes.overview: Olie and Billy pretend to be pirates; Olie records a video about his family; Olie, Zowie, and Pappy pretend to go fishing on his houseboat.

episodes.name: Where's Pappy? / Hopin' and a Hoppin' / Just Like Dad
episodes.overview: While Olie and Zowie are baby-sitting Pappy, he tries to teach them a magic trick.  The vanishing grandfather trick seems to work too well, though.; Olie's trying to hop through the entire house on one foot.  Frustration rises as he keeps getting interrupted.; Olie decides that he wants to be just like dad.  However, he learns that he might not have to change very much.

episodes.name: Spot's Birthday / Sir Rolie Polie Oily / Universal Spot
episodes.overview: It is Spot's birthday and the Polies look back when Spot was first adopted back to the day that Zowie was a baby; Olie pretends to be a knight; a new remote makes everything go crazy.

episodes.name: Squaresville / Zowie's Harmonica / Unruly Polie Olie
episodes.overview: Olie devises a square world for him and Billy to play in; Zowie has a harmonica; Olie and Billy learn that life without rules isn't always a good thing.

episodes.name: Rolie Polie Pogo / 2 Not So Easy Pieces / Gotta Dance
episodes.overview: Olie's new pogo stick causes trouble; Confusion arises over who broke Pappy's model boat; Zowie grows jealous of Olie and Billy's victory dances.

episodes.name: Pappy Days / Copy Cat and Mouse / The Bump
episodes.overview: A storm ruins the Polies' plans, but Pappy manages to entertain Olie and Zowie with stories about his childhood.; Mrs. Polie tells Olie to put Zowie down for her nap; however, when Zowie starts to copy Olie's every movie, he realizes that he's in for some trouble.; The Polies hear a strange bump in the night.  Olie and Zowie, believing it to be an evil space monster, try to hunt down the source of the sound, while Percy Polie tries to solve the problem in a more practical way.

episodes.name: Zowie Got Game / Hickety Ups / Chili's Cold
episodes.overview: Zowie plays ball with Olie; Olie gets the hiccups; Chili the Refrigerator gets sick with a cold.

episodes.name: Our 2 Dads / What to Be / The Magno-Man
episodes.overview: Olie and Zowie will be meeting their Uncle Gizmo for the first time.  However, aunts and uncles are people to be avoided (according to Billy, that is).; Olie can't decide what to be when he grows up.; Olie and Billy play with dad's new invention, even though he told them not to.  Soon they find themselves in a ""sticky"" situation.

episodes.name: Scavenger Hunt / What's Up Jack? / Grown Ups and Kids
episodes.overview: A scavenger hunt in the backyard; Olie pretends to rescue Zowie's toy dragons from a jack-in-the-box, who pretends to be the bad guy; Olie, Billy and Zowie imagine themselves as the grown-ups and the Polie parents as the kids.

episodes.name: Mom's Night Out / Polie Pox / Da Plane! Da Plane!
episodes.overview: Mrs. Polie goes out for the night to go bowling; Zowie feels lonely about playing with her brother Olie when he catches the Polie Pox (their equivalent to chickenpox); Olie, Pappy, Billy and Zowie race planes.

episodes.name: Surrrprise! / Mousetrap / To Space And Beyond
episodes.overview: The Polie family prepares a surprise birthday party for Olie; The mouse from the cat clock escapes; Pappy, Billy, Olie and Zowie pretend to be in space.

episodes.name: Go Fish / Roller Derby / A Birthday Present for Mom
episodes.overview: Olie brings the school fish (first seen in TOP DOG FISH) home again for the weekend.  While under his care, however, the fish appears to get sick.; Olie wants to try out his new skates, but must do his homework first.  Olie then determines that he can use his skates to help him with his homework.; Olie opens a lemonade stand to earn enough money to buy his mom a birthday present.  Though business is slow, an unexpected customer helps out.

episodes.name: A Little Souped Coup-y / Rain Rain Go Away / Beach Blanket Gizmo
episodes.overview: Olie's family tries to get themselves and Coupy the Car ready for a parade; The rain inspires Olie to stay in the house and dance for the sun to come out; When Olie cannot go to the beach Uncle Gizmo throws a beach party for him.

episodes.name: Y2 Pappy / Upside Downers / Cutie Go Bye-Bye
episodes.overview: Pappy's speed-o-lator gear goes out of whack, causing him to act erratically.  Son, Olie and Zowie find themselves playing a game called ""Find Pappy's Gears"".; A busted lever bolt on the Magnatron polarizes the Polie family.  Everything ese is normal, but the Polies are living on the ceiling.; Zowie's new doll, Cutie Cries-a-Lot, is very annoying to Spot.  Spot does his best to find some peace and quiet.

episodes.name: Olie's Note / Baby Binky / A Record Bustin' Day
episodes.overview: Olie's excited about the note teacher sent home to his parents until Billy suggests it might be about something bad Olie did.; Billy's little brother comes over to play.  Immediately, Binky makes s bad impression on Zowie.; Inspired by a TV show where people break world records, Pappy and the kids are inspired to grab the movie camera and film some record breaking of their own.

episodes.name: Where O Where Did Olie Go / Gone Dog-Gone Dog / A Chip Off the Old Orb
episodes.overview: When he crashes his Space Boy Space Explorer toy into dad's Magnatron, Olie finds himself shrunk to miniature size.; A Magnatron accident causes Spot to grow enormously.  Spot then eats the Magnatron.; Olie and dad both get shrunk to miniature size by the Magnatron.  They must find some way to get mom's attention, so she can help them get back to normal.

episodes.name: The Legend Of Spookie Ookie / Oooh Scary / Zowie, Queen Of The Pumpkins
episodes.overview: A legendary robot, Spookie Ookie, is scary; Olie and his friends build a scare zone for his friends; Zowie and Spookie Ookie must find their way into his house.

episodes.name: Looove Bug / Seven Minutes And Counting / Olie's New Suit
episodes.overview: Polly Pie comes to Polieville to play with Olie and Billy and they welcome Polly to Polieville; Olie learns seven minutes as he tries to get ready for his baseball game; Olie's new suit comes to the Polies house, but he doesn't like the way it looks because he's afraid his guests, Billy and Polly, will laugh at him.

episodes.name: Mission Invisible / Muscle Bots / Hypno-Eyes
episodes.overview: Olie becomes invisible when his mom calls him; While Percy and Polina are jogging, Olie teaches Billy and Zowie to become Muscle-Bots; Olie gets hypno glasses.

episodes.name: Starry Starry Night / Snowie / Jingle Jangle Day's Eve
episodes.overview: When Zowie breaks Pappy's star named Starry, Klanky must fix it; Olie plays in the snow; Percy reads a holiday story.

episodes.name: Little Bot Zoo / Zowie Soupy Hero / Coupy Won't Fit
episodes.overview: Percy is watching Zowie and Binky.  Unable to get them down for a nap, he briefly indulges them with a pretend zoo game.; Zowie dreams of being a super hero.  When she awakens, she discovers not all heros need be super.; Since Coupy can't fit in the garage, the polies decide to clean out their old junk with a garage sale.  Items bring back many memories in this clip segment.

episodes.name: Zowie Do, Olie Too / Dicey Situation / Square Plane In A Round Hole
episodes.overview: Zowie finds some stuff to do; Dicey, the Bevels' cat, gets lost; Olie borrows Billy's plane and promises to be careful with it, only to accidentally break it when he tries flying it through a window.

episodes.name: Home Sick / Leaf Me Alone / Round and Round and Square We Go
episodes.overview: The Polies' house comes down with a cold, and they try to make the house feel better; Zowie and Binky chase a leaf all over the backyard, wrecking each card house that Olie and Billy make; The Bevils and the Polies are having a backyard barbecue.

episodes.name: Throw it in Gear / A Tooth for a Tooth / Polie Collectables
episodes.overview: Olie puts things into gear; Olie loses a tooth, and tapes the Tooth Fairy's arrival with Billy; Olie's family look at their collectables.

episodes.name: Doggy Day Afternoon / Visibly Invisible / Itty Bitty Baby Starry
episodes.overview: Spot has a great day; Olie becomes invisible; When a baby star crash lands in Planet Polie, Percy must attempt a way to bring him back to his parents to let him help out to bring him back into space.

episodes.name: Baby Talk / Putting on the Dog / Whistlin' Zowie
episodes.overview: Olie and Billy try to teach Binky some new words; Spot gets clean in time for a date with Fifi; Zowie tries to whistle.

episodes.name: Square Roots / 1 Olie, 2 Olie, 3 Olie, 4 / Switcheroo
episodes.overview: Olie makes a video of the Bevels' life as a family; Olie clones himself in an attempt to get to have fun and have his homework done at once; Olie and Billy switch their shapes.

episodes.name: Cool It! / Polie Pests / Camp Out
episodes.overview: On a hot day, the Polies turn their backyard into a skating rink; Olie and Polly learn about caterpillars; The kids camp out in the backyard.

episodes.name: Let's Make History / Adventures of Space Dads / Silly Willy Day
episodes.overview: The kids put on a play about the history of the planet Polie.; When Olie and Billie start agruing over a game of tag, the dads step in and show them how to play without arguing.; As the Comet Sillius heads toward Polieville, color returns to the grey lives of the Polies marking one of their favorite holidays.

episodes.name: Giz-Nesia / 1001 Geerabian Nights / Showdown at the Ol' Polie Corral
episodes.overview: Uncle Gizmo comes over but all Olie and Zowie want to do is watch a movie.  While trying to get their attention, Gizmo suddenly develops amnesia.; Billie and Olie have to read a book for school.  Thanks to a mishap with dad's redecoratorator, as they read, they begin floating on their own ""magic carpet"".; Zowie wants to watch a cowboy show but Olie wants to watch Space Boy, so they flip a coin and Zowie wins. Olie is mad until Giz and Zowie start playing Cowboys, and he plays, too.

episodes.name: When Zowie All Growed Up / Scruba-Dub-Dubby, A Spot in the Tubby / Hide and Go Sleep
episodes.overview: Zowie is feeling down about being too little to do the things that Olie can do, so Gizmo tells her about the time when Percy was feeling the same way; Olie gives Spot a bath; Zowie and Olie play hide and seek.

episodes.name: Gotcha / Springy Chicken / A Polie Egg-Stravaganza
episodes.overview: Olie and Billy chase after Pappy's runaway dentures; The Polies prepare themselves for the Springy Chicken; Springy Chicken's baby hatches early and the Polies try everything they can to keep the chick in the nest.

episodes.name: Detective Polie's Cookie Caper / The Lie / Guess It's Nite Nite
episodes.overview: Olie tries to finds out who stole the cookies that Polina made; Olie tells a lie when he doesn't want to eat his brussel sprouts; It's lights out in the Polies' house, and Olie and Zowie make it hard for Pappy to get them in bed.

episodes.name: Rewind / Who's The Bestest Of Them All / But Why?
episodes.overview: Percy makes a Rewind-a-lator, which causes everything to go backwards; Olie wants to know who is the best; Zowie keeps asking "but why?" at everything and anything.

episodes.name: Just Putting Around / Soupy Zowie and the Bogie Bot / No Hugs Please
episodes.overview: Olie's dad plays golf; Zowie thinks she is a superhero after believing there's a monstrous robot under her bed; Olie doesn't want any hugs.

episodes.name: REMOVE
episodes.overview: REMOVE

episodes.name: Family Portrait / Show and Tell / Little Helping Hand
episodes.overview: Polina wants the family to wear blue for picture day; Olie looks for something to bring to show and tell; Percy helps Big Gene and Little Gene repair their spaceship.

episodes.name: Pretend Friend / Beddy Day for Daddy / Chunk Squarey
episodes.overview: Zowie has fun with an imaginary friend who may not be so pretend after all.; Percy Polie comes down with a cold, and Mrs. Polie recruits Zowie to make sure that her husband stays in bed until he recovers.; Polieville is caught up in ""The Twirl"", a sing 'n' dance sensation pioneered by Chunk Squarey, who is, like Billy, from Cuby.

episodes.name: We Scream for Ice Cream / Pomps Up / Anchor Away
episodes.overview: The kids go to a planet made of ice cream; The boys help make Gizmo's pomp stand upright when it somehow flops in front of Gizmo's face; Olie's parents remember the day they first met.

episodes.name: Guys and Dollies / Dinglie Danglie Doodle / Dancin' Machines
episodes.overview: Olie finds out why girls play with dolls; Zowie learns a bad word and must find a way to stop saying it all the time; Some of the machines begin to dance.

episodes.name: Bubble Trouble / Calling All Space Boys / Binky Break
episodes.overview: Olie and Zowie are having trouble with bubbles and they can't find their way home; Olie goes on a space adventure; Zowie babysits Binky as she tries everything she can to stop Binky from breaking everything.

episodes.name: Who's the Worstest / Puzzle Peace / Robo Rangers
episodes.overview: After Billy loses a game of boinky ball, Olie decides play other games with him, by losing on purpose to make Billy better; Olie is trying to find a puzzle piece; Olie and Billy are Robo Rangers and go through all the tips when scouting.

episodes.name: Rust In Space / All Wound Up / Soap-bot Derby
episodes.overview: Olie discovers rust in outer space; Polina is feeling all wound up; Olie and Billy race against Zowie and Polli.

episodes.name: Treasure of the Rolie Polie Madre / Lost and Found / Zowie's Petals
episodes.overview: When Zowie accidentally takes Olie and Billy's treasure, she does not tell them, causing the boys to suspect each other of taking it; Olie loses a toy his dad gives him; Zowie finds a flower that she tries to nurse back to health.

episodes.name: Day for Night / Zowie Cycle / Mighty Olie
episodes.overview: A solar eclipse in Polieville is happening, making the sun is going black; Zowie wants to ride a bicycle; Olie thinks that he is tough.

episodes.name: Space Telly / Ultra Good Space Heroes / It's a Roundi-ful Life
episodes.overview: Olie is watching space on a television; Olie and Billy pretend to be heroes; After Olie runs away and thinks nobody wants him around anymore Percy, Zowie and Polina must find a way to bring him back.

episodes.name: Cheery Spherey Day / Diary Daze / Rock-a-bye Billie
episodes.overview: The Polies invite the Bevels over to celebrate a holiday that reminds them that all shapes are important; Olie has to write down his weekend activities in a diary for a school project, however when he spends all his time thinking up fun activities to put into his diary, he misses out on the real weekend fun; It's the annual Polie/Bevel talent show but Billy can't think of any talents that he has. Olie, however, overhears Billy singing a lullaby to Binky, and points out something Billy has been taking for granted, that he can sing Binky to sleep.

episodes.name: Housey Wake up / Blue Coupey / YesTHANKYOUPlease
episodes.overview: Housey is overworked and refuses to wake up.  This suggests to the Polies that maybe they should all take it a little easy.; Coupey is jealous over the attention Percy is giving to Motorboy when Gizmo brings him around for a tune-up.  Wheelie convinces Coupey that he's still an important member of the Polie family.; Zowie learns a few lessons in etiquette from ""Auntie"" Gizmo.

episodes.name: Wheelie / Clippy Clop / Doofy Looking Olie
episodes.overview: Olie and Zowie meet a new friend named Wheelie who has a wheel instead of legs; Pappy's horse Clippy has loses her confidence and Olie and Zowie try to help her regain it; Convinced by a television commercial that he looks doofy, Olie wants to get a box spiffer-upper kit to improve his looks, but as soon as he gets it and starts doing so right away, his parents decide to improve their looks, too. Zowie, who didn't use the spiffer-upper, thinks they look funnier than before.

episodes.name: Song of the Blue Fish / Lady Bug Lady Bug Fly Away Home / Bevel Beddie Bye
episodes.overview: Olie wants to hear the blue fish song; Olie is trying to get a ladybug back to its home; Olie sleeps over at the Bevels' house.

episodes.name: A Little Hero / Binky's Brthday / Hiding in Plain Sight
episodes.overview: Big Gene Green and Junior invite Olie and his dad to their planet for a picnic; Olie, Billy, and Polly compete to be the superest bot of them all, each displaying their own individual powers; Olie's dad uses some kind of machine to try to turn on a broken light in the kitchen, only in the process to mix things up.

episodes.name: Making the Best of It / Superest Bot of Them All / Oh Olie, Olie It's a Wired World
episodes.overview: Big Gene Green and Junior invite Olie and his dad to their planet for a picnic; Olie, Billy, and Polly compete to be the superest bot of them all, each displaying their own individual powers; Olie's dad uses some kind of machine to try to turn on a broken light in the kitchen, only in the process to mix things up.

episodes.name: Forgive And Forget It / Spot That Hero / A Jingle Jangle Wish
episodes.overview: Olie gets mad at Spot when he destroys his 'Gonna-Win-It-All' ball, and soon learns to forgive Spot; Spot dreams of becoming a superhero after hearing about Fifi saving a little bot from a car; After Olie and Zowie visit Klanky Klaus, Zowie forgets to ask Klanky about her gift, so it's up to Olie to send Klanky the message.

episodes.name: Dino Bots / A Couple of Good Sports / Pappy's Pals
episodes.overview: Olie and Polly search for dino bots with Pappy; Olie and Billy are being good sports to their mates; While Pappy is away, his animals stay at the Polies' house.

episodes.name: Bots Will Be Boys / Screwy / Good Princess Zowie
episodes.overview: Percy and Gizmo compete against each other to see who can do repairs on Pappy's farm the fastest.  In their haste, their work turns out to be less than desirable.; Olie and Billy meet the new kid in school.  He's rude, crude, obnoxious, over-bearing, and lonely.; Olie, Billy, Polly and Zowie are playing the King of Everything game.  Zowie wants the King of Everything crown, but doesn't know how to get it.

episodes.name: Madame Bot-erfly / Boxing Day / It's Just Not Fair
episodes.overview: A polka dotted butterfly lead Olie and Zowie to some lost treasures belonging to Dad, Gizmo and Pappy.  They soon find that not all lost treasures are truely lost.; Polly and Olie believe that Billie is moving.  He's got all the boxes needed, and he has too little time to play, but he also has a big surprise.; Billie decides that it's not fair that he is not allowed to skate in the house.  In fact, a lot of things are unfair, and he's not going to put up with it anymore!

episodes.name: Dare Ya / Round Beard's Ghost / Screwy Day
episodes.overview: Screwy is daring Olie and Billy to do things they are afraid to do; Olie searches for Round Beard's ghost; Screwy is bullying Billy because he can't tumble.

episodes.name: Tug-A-Wheelie / Always Chasing Rainbows / Follow Yer Nose
episodes.overview: Wheelie tries to make Olie, Zowie, Billy and Pollie feel good, especially when it is shown he can't always come to the park; When Olie and Zowie cannot play they must find a rainbow, a Rolie Trolie and a pot of golden lugnuts; Olie loses his nose and chases it all around Polieville Park.

episodes.name: Ten Foot Olie / The Big Drip / Invasion of the Ticklers!
episodes.overview: Olie grows to ten feet tall; An annoying drip is waking up the family; in fact, a small leak ends up flooding the house; Ticklers invade Olie's world.

episodes.name: Widget Watchers / Shippin' and Receivin / The Bestest Field Trip of All
episodes.overview: Screwy's favorite constellation is going extinct, so Olie and the others convince everyone in Polieville to watch the Widget constellation; Not being able to finish their school project, Olie and Billy try to finish their castle a different way; Everyone is going on a field trip to Pappy's farm and Screwy claims to be the best at everything.

episodes.name: Blind as a Bot / Beauty and the Bot / Olie's Bot-ler
episodes.overview: Percy takes off his glasses to make himself look young again; Olie and Pollie get roles in a school play; a robot helps Olie and his family clean up a mess.

episodes.name: Chunk Sings the Blues / Cast Off / Orb's Well That Ends Well
episodes.overview: Chunk gets a bimple on his forehead and someone should fill in for him until his bimple is gone; When Olie cracks his orb, he must get a cast for his head; It's the last day of school and everyone is excited to be on Summer Break, and soon find out a little more about Screwy.

episodes.name: Soupey Zowie and Diaper Dyna-mo / Magnetitus / A Little Wish
episodes.overview: Zowie wants to play with the big kids; When Screwy comes down with a case of Magnetitus. It spreads all over the kids including Olie; Zowie and Olie stay with Pappy.

episodes.name: Blast From The Past / Gone Screwy / Mother Giz
episodes.overview: Aunt Polieanna gives Pappy a surprise visit and reminisces on her many adventures after getting swept away through a wormhole; Olie and Screwy become cosmobot cadets; Mom and Dad go dancing.

episodes.name: A Little Jingle Jangle Sparkler / A Gift For Klanky Klaus / All's Squared Away Day
episodes.overview: It's Zowie's turn to pick the Jingle Jangle star, but when she picks a very old star, Olie isn't convinced it will shine; Zowie gives a present to Klanky Klaus; When Olie loses the last piece for Billy's present, Olie must find it.

episodes.name: Give It Back Gloomius / Olie Unsproinged / Bot O' The Housey
episodes.overview: When Gloomius takes the swing, Polly Pie's dog, FiFi, and the stuff from Polieville Park, the Polies finds a way to get it back. When Olie hurts himself from his skate stunt, he must find a way to help his spring. While Percy goes away on a trip with Baxter, he leaves Olie and Billy in charge of Housey.

episodes.name: Gumming Up The Works / Hands Across Polieville / Rolie Polie Pop Tops
episodes.overview: When some gum escapes Planet Polie, Olie and Billy make it return; Olie, Billy, and Screwy get stuck together and are forced to do things together as a team; Screwy loses his head when he drinks too much soda, so Olie and Billy try to retrieve it.

episodes.name: Lunchmaster 3000 / Puzzle Planet / Totally Backwards Day
episodes.overview: Olie grows jealous of Screwy's new lunchbox that can talk; Olie, Billy, and Aunt Polieanna search for the missing pieces of Billy's board game; Everything in Polieville is turned backwards, so Olie does things backwards for a day, from sliding up the slide to talking backwards.

episodes.name: Zowie's School Daze / Beacon Blinkin' Day / When Mr. Sunny Gets Blue
episodes.overview: Olie prepares Zowie for her first day of school; When Olie gets bullied, he learns that bullying is wrong and he has a "blinking beacon day"; everything on the planet changes colors. Mr. Sunny turns blue after Olie and his family forget to thank him, and Olie and his family must help him to become happy.

episodes.name: Straighten Upper-er To The Rescue / The Great Manner Hunt / Polie Poppin' Day
episodes.overview: Olie's antennae loses its shape, so he has to wear a straighten-upper for a week until his antennae is straight again; Olie and Billy make videos around the house to teach Zowie some good manners; It's a special day for the Polies.

episodes.name: The Secret Life Of Babies / Shhhh / The Coochie Coochie Coo Blues
episodes.overview: Coochie and her brother Coo are introduced in this episode. Coochie and Coo become part of the Polie Family, Olie and Billy try to be quiet so the babies can sleep, and Zowie grows jealous of the babies because they get so much attention.

episodes.name: Big Babies / Kooky Kites / Twin Sittin
episodes.overview: Percy builds a machine and the babies, being babies, activate it without even knowing what it does, causing Olie to switch brains with Spot and the babies to switch brains with the parents. Now Zowie must find a way to get everyone to switch back, and fast; It's Kooky Kite Day and the Polie kids are rearin' to get started on Kite making, even Coochie and Coo seem like eager beavers; Uncle Giz is over to babysit Olie, Zowie, Coochie and Coo. Olie and Zowie know what a great babysitter Uncle Giz.

episodes.name: A Polie Family Frolic
episodes.overview: The first part of "The Baby Bot Chase".

episodes.name: Has Anyone Seen My Coo?
episodes.overview: The second part of "The Baby Bot Chase".

episodes.name: Babies Go Home
episodes.overview: The third part of "The Baby Bot Chase".
